jade.core.persistence
Interface Savable

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public interface Savable
extends jade.util.leap.Serializable

This interface provides callback methods that will be invoked during saving, loading, reloading, freezing and thawing operations of an agent that had previously registered this Savable object to the agent's Persistence Helper. If no Savable object is registered a default one is used that implements all callback methods invoking (if present) methods with the same signature in the agent instance.

Author:
Giovanni Caire - TILAB.
See Also:
PersistenceHelper.registerSavable(Savable s)

Method Detail

beforeSave

void beforeSave()
Actions to perform before saving an agent that has registered this Savable object to its PersistenceHelepr. This method should be defined to execute some actions just before the current agent is saved to a persistent store.

afterLoad

void afterLoad()
Actions to perform after loading an agent that has registered this Savable object to its PersistenceHelepr. This method should be defined to execute some actions just after the current agent is loaded from a persistent store.

beforeReload

void beforeReload()
Actions to perform before reloading an agent that has registered this Savable object to its PersistenceHelepr. This method should be defined to execute some actions just before the current agent is reloaded from a persistent store.

afterReload

void afterReload()
Actions to perform after reloading an agent that has registered this Savable object to its PersistenceHelepr. This method should be defined to execute some actions just after the current agent is reloaded from a persistent store.

beforeFreeze

void beforeFreeze()
Actions to perform before freezing an agent that has registered this Savable object to its PersistenceHelepr. This method should be defined to execute some actions just before the current agent is frozen to a persistent store.

afterThaw

void afterThaw()
Actions to perform after thawing an agent that has registered this Savable object to its PersistenceHelepr. This method should be defined to execute some actions just after the current agent is thawed from a persistent store.
